website_summaries.verdict: Delivers a multitude of massage modes to give users just the relief they need.
pros: Delivers low-voltage pulses through 6 electrode pads
24 different modes, including deep tissue, to allow the TENS unit to deliver the perfect results
Timer can be set between 10 and 60 minutes of continuous use
cons: Sometimes delivers too much electrical pulse, which can be painful

customer_reviews.title: Tested On Severe Spam / Sciatica / Lower Back Intense Pain
customer_reviews.text: This thing Works, I am not sure about the reliablity or longevity of the machine because i felt sometimes it does not send electricity until i move the pads and tweek them a little (maybe 10% of the time) BUT i have a severe Spasm in my lower back / sciatia pain, and i cant even walk for about an entiree week (even after being injected kennalog and taking naproxen for about 6 days), until one night the miracle happens! I use this thing one night and just right the next morning i can walk like 70% better!! thats when this machine earn 5 stars for me. My wife later used succesfully for a shoulder/ neck pain.
customer_reviews.author: Wil Cor

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Received my Tens Unit, used it exactly 5 times. This morning while setting it up to use, I literally BUMPED the screen on the corner of my end table. The whole screen went black, then when I turned it on the screen looked like it was shattered. It appears that the LED screen splattered internally! This is worse than the glass screens on IPhones! The warranty does not cover this type of damage, it only covers defective issues or if the product fails. Discussing this with the customer service gets you know where. I will look for a better model, different company and cut my losses as a bad purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joan L

customer_reviews.title: It really does work ! Just like I hoped it would.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a stiff neck for months and the TENS machine is working to get rid of that situation. It is a bit of a weird feeling having your muscles worked by machine, but it is also an enjoyable effect in the process. My neck is starting to get better. Yay. But I found it worked better doing one side at a time. It works one muscle that way.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Allnatt

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for two days... then it died
customer_reviews.text: When I first started using this TENs unit, it was great. Nothing else I tried was helping with the severe pain in my knee. After several sessions, I had much less pain and more mobility in my knee. Then, the unit rapidly became less and less powerful until it was unable to deliver any stimulation at all. I tried recharging the battery, replacing the pads, swapping out the leads--nothing fixed the problem. I'm not willing to pay shipping for this company's warranty, so I'm returning this unit to Amazon. I've already ordered a different TENs device, since this therapy seems to work wonders. I just wish this particular unit lasted more than 48 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Polyphemus

customer_reviews.title: This is a great unit, my wife said it is much like ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit, my wife said it is much like the ones she used in the hospital. There is a lot of options to choose from, I am not a techie but I was using the unit within a few minutes. With two leads & four pads the area of coverage is great. We highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: James A. Smith III

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The unit doesn’t work. The screen doesn’t work. Unfortunately, we didn’t try it out immediately & now the return window is closed. I won’t make that mistake again. Nor will I purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Lagarde

customer_reviews.title: This is the one
customer_reviews.text: I waited almost a year to review this product because I have owned several tens units from 50 to 500 dollars. Most fall short after a few months. I am a 57 year old former lifelong athlete with plenty of pains and physical aches. This morning I realized how much I like this unit and it's power. My feet were hurting yesterday and today they feel great. I would recommend this product to others, especially if you can handle the higher voltages for this type of unit. The lifetime warranty is just icing on the cake. Very well built and feels like it.
customer_reviews.author: Lakke2120

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: My hands have arthritis in the finger joints - so much that I cannot make a fist and they become sore. I can no longer play golf due to the inability to grip well. I decided to try the Tens Unit with red light therapy (bought from Amazon) - it has taken 2 months but the results are amazing. I only used it on my left hand for a basis of comparison - and I can easily see the swelling in the joints have gone down a lot - and the shape of my fingers are returning to normal. I am very happy with these results so far.
customer_reviews.author: SpiritJourney

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I have this device since 4-16-2018, I used it the first day arrived and was fully charged. Works like a charm, it is not touch screen which is that is good for me because it will mass up the setting each time you touch it. The device automatically turns off after the setting time over, setting time is between 10 to 60 minutes, if you have it on 60 minutes and the time went down to any other numbers, you always can add minutes without disrupting but total up to 60 minutes. It has 24 modes which are different to the desire you're comfortable with.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Research thoroughly before purchasing this unit
customer_reviews.text: I previously rated the item 4 stars. I have dropped it to 3 after using it a few times. The reasons are 1) Unit is too large. 2) Many of the settings are too similar to distinguish from others. The claim of 24 settings is ambiguous at best. 3) Only 1 setting can be used during a session. Other manufacturers have a setting where the unit cycles through all available settings during the timeframe selected. I don't recommend purchase of this unit when there are many others at a similar price that do a better job.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Not for me, I guess?
customer_reviews.text: I sustained two herniated discs in an auto accident 16+ months ago. After physical therapy, epidural injections and trials of gabapentin, I was recommended to try a TENS united to control the dull/irritated sciatica discomfort. I attempted this multiple times, to no avail. It distracts me from the dull ache during use, but the ache is worse after use..
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: be sure to read all the information that comes with the unit
customer_reviews.text: this unit has 24 modes which for me is too many.... you have to move through each mode to get to the one that works for you...but the unit is small and very easy to operate once you read through the manual...also like the photo card that indicates the best places to position the pads on your body. The intensity is as strong as you make it and all of the modes I have tried none of the pulsations are constant.
customer_reviews.author: pdole

customer_reviews.title: Helped my headaches and shoulder stress
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why this thing doesn't have 5 stars. I'm almost considering buying a few of them and putting them away so I have them for years to come. The pads are larger than other pads and they have a tab to use to pull them off. They are VERY sticky. I can see how the sticky wouldn't last if you oiled yourself up and put these on but if you clean your skin before applying you will get a lot of life out of these pads. It's pretty intuitive. I never looked at the directions. Packaging was very nice. This fits in an iPhone 5 sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: James W Newkirk

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a while, then DIED
customer_reviews.text: Nice having this option at home. Adhering to my back was a bit awkward but certainly doable. Offered modest relief. BUT after only about 8-9 uses it DIED. Several attempts to reach a company rep (leaving messages when they suggest doing so because they are busy) have yet to bear fruit. There is some indication online that I may have passed the return deadline (apparently about a month after purchase). I am not a happy customer. Waiting to hear back. Based on my experience to date, I would steer clear of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tizzy

customer_reviews.title: Gives Relief but Poor Instructions
customer_reviews.text: Nice Looking, Works Well ( after I figured out how to use it ) The instructions are printed in small low contrast type face. A battery charge lasts a long time. The leads are a bit short and no belt clip to carry unit. Only ONE storage pad included for two leads. Had to order another for about $7.95. There is a touch screen model that I would have bought if I had seen it before I ordered this unit. Adjustable shock level does give relief.
customer_reviews.author: V. O. Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief after physical therapy ended
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit after hearing about a different device a friend purchased. Having undergone physical therapy for knee, glut and hamstring problems off and on for the past two years, I asked my therapist about using a unit at home once I was discharged from treatment. The few times I have used it, it has helped reduce the lingering pain I have had. Right now, I am pain free and loving it! I will continue to use the Tens Unit as needed and am pleased with the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - did not work
customer_reviews.text: It did not work - charged it per the instructions before first use, per the instructions; it showed a fully charged battery. However, the unit did not work - it didn’t even light up. Spent over an hour trying to get it going...waste of time!
customer_reviews.author: ross simon

customer_reviews.title: I would NOT RECOMMEND based on my experience
customer_reviews.text: Item was used & repackaged/film sloppily replaced. Was not the same item/model as shown in photo. And had tiny (candy sprinkle size... Only thing I could think of 😝😆) hatched worms/eggs inside the packaging box. Gross! Cleaned WELL and had to used STAT after a car accident/injury. Stopped working after 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Awful. Please don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This product was awful. I have purchased Tens units before and this was by far the WORST. Not only did all of the pads it came with stop sticking after use, but the pads kept shocking me when I would move with them on. So unhappy with this and returning it ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't aware that I would receive what is an apparently a used unit. There are many scratches on the plastic face cover and the battery was already charged when the instruction manual CLEARLY stated that the battery would need to be charged for at least 10 hours. My friend that also purchased one had to charge the battery for o we 6 hours. When I went online to register it for the warranty I was not able to register the device. Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, and really helps relieve pain.
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than my cell phone, and comes with a clip. Its easy to use/figure out. I like that the pads snap on as opposed to the wire ones. I just wish I could find the 4x2 size pads at a better price, and a larger quantity. This is so much better than taking medicine. It is small enough to wear out if needed too. I bought a second one so we don't have to take turns!
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great TENS unit
customer_reviews.text: The TENS Unit Plus 24 arrived on time and was very easy to set up and charge. I bought the unit at the recommendation of my physical therapist, and I'm so glad I did. I love the different modes and versatility to use on different parts of the body. My husband saw me using my unit and had me order one for him too. He loves it for his back and hip pain. It helps him alleviate his pain without using medications. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Support is lacking, cannot get the "free pads" advertised...
customer_reviews.text: And I am concerned that the "Lifetime Warranty" won't apply since the serial number literally rubbed off... Works, but support appears likely to be exaggerated... It has lasted months so far and I feel like one of the channels becomes "shorted" out occasionally and it doesn't appear to be the end-result "business" side.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan P. D.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I have a very stiff neck. I just got this today and tried for the first time. It is pretty easy to use. I just wish you didn't have to cycle through all the settings to go back. This is my first time trying a tens unit and I used it for 15 minutes on level 2 and 3. I was very surprised how well it worked and how much relief I got. I was skeptical even when using as it didn't seem like it would do anything. So far so good. I will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great device at a very good price!
customer_reviews.text: This little TENS unit is great! It’s the size of my cell phone, and fits nicely in my pocket so I can carry it while going about my day. It’s easy to use, and I love that I can set it to work for up to an hour. The battery charge lasts a long time. The price is great, especially when compared to a really expensive unit I checked out at the state fair. I tell anyone about this that would benefit by using a TENS unit
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lou Who

customer_reviews.title: Loses charge after 30 min, zaps me occasionally, dropped it and display broken now
customer_reviews.text: I'm thinking the non-rechargeable that use regular batteries is better as once you lose the charge you are done until you get it charged again. In my case 1 hr to 10 hrs of charging - doesn't matter. Only lasts for 30 min. Battery indicates fully charged every time. Don't make mistake of charging it with power on - it doesn't take a charge at all. Zapping may be due to electrodes losing adhesion after a few uses, but it is a jolt. Now I'm dead in the water and can only see a few features, so flying blind. Trying to pick new one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief is in sight.
customer_reviews.text: This unit was easy to learn the controls and attach to the area needed, I was diagnosed with a tear in the Labrum of my right shoulder, my orthopedic doctor advised me to get a TENS unit to relieve muscle tension in my shoulder after he had administered an injection of Depomedrol. We are trying to delay or make surgery unnecessary by making my shoulder not hurt as bad. So far by using the TENS unit 2-3 times a day for 20 minutes per session the pain and discomfort have been reducing a little more each day.
customer_reviews.author: Ed DeCoster

customer_reviews.title: Tens Unit Plus 24
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely dislike this item. It is supposed to produce different strengths, but I find no such thing. I have to put the strength on the very highest setting to get the lowest feeling. What is wrong with this device? I will be sending it back unless the company gets in touch with me to explain why this is happening.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy! This is my 2nd purchase to give as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging. Easy to use. Love the lifetime warranty! Been experiencing nerve pain in my neck that has affected my shoulders and arms enough to where I can’t sleep comfortably at night. Used this twice already and although not immediate, I’m feeling my pain subside each day. This is my 2nd review because I purchased another unit for my best friend who tried mine. Still works perfectly and she loved it as well! Great company and service.
customer_reviews.author: MAK

customer_reviews.title: Best quality, Best performance
customer_reviews.text: Awesome muscle stimulator. I have owned a couple of tens machines before this one is the best and strongest so far. Large screen and great battery life. I haven’t charge it yet. Comes with 24 modes and you can swicht to intensity to 20 different strengths. I am very pleased with my tens unit and recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Farshad

customer_reviews.title: Really Really good Pulse Massager
customer_reviews.text: Charged quickly out of the box & have used several times and I have felt relief each time. I have neurological and muscular lower back pain and needed something to help relieve the muscular so I can sleep without muscle relaxers. So a friend told me about the Tens Unit Plus 24 so I looked it up and the unit had very good reviews. So I am very satisfied with the purchase and the relief it has brought. I would recommend it to anyone suffering with back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Infinitinbeyond

customer_reviews.title: Great Rechargeable Tens Unit
customer_reviews.text: I have just been using this product for a few days. It has helped relieve the pain of my arthritic knees very much. It also feels good while using it, although one should start out at a low setting at first to find your comfort level. The display is nice and the whole unit feels well made. The six different “main” modes feel distinct, and there are four variations within each “main” mode. I like the tai-chi mode the best as it makes my knees feel so happy! The rechargeable battery is a winner and saves on battery buying costs and hassle. I recommend the TechCare Plus 24.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Ro

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: My chiropractor won't be happy that I won't need to visit for his professional TENS treatments anytime soon. This little unit is easy to use and effective. I sleep on my left shoulder and am often sore there. 20 min treatment lasts for days. My lower back was sore yesterday from a round of golf. 20 min treatment and I skipped my usual Advil and a heating pad. I hope you get the same good results.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: Here is my review too :) delivery was very fast and it’s came even before mentioned time .. very well packed ... I ordered TechCare for my boyfriend and now for myself! He had elbow problems and I bad shoulder pain. We both have this little machine looks small but it’s powerful.. has lots of options and some on them are very cool ! In a box was also the instructions with a little book.. that was very helpful! Thank you for great product!
customer_reviews.author: Alina Melnyk

customer_reviews.title: It's helping my neck pain, but..
customer_reviews.text: This is helping my neck pain but the pads don't adhere well to my skin, even after rubbing with alcohol to cleanse the site. I clean the pads after each use but they still want to peel away from my skin after a short time. I also wish the time setting on this would not automatically 'time out' after an hour ( the longest time setting). I'd rather it continue to work without the auto timer shut down. It has plenty of power and the battery lasts a long time before it needs a recharge. I'm happy with the unit in how it's doing the job it's intended, excepting for the issues described.
customer_reviews.author: Linlea

customer_reviews.title: Positive relief!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had known about this product years ago, it’s helps my muscle pain so much. I have sciatica, age onset scoliosis and degenerative disk disease.. In those conditions the muscles around the spine tighten which leads to pain. The Tens patches truly help release the tension and give relief. I also bought one of these units for two of ours kids. Their families love it and our college age grandchildren use it for muscle tightness after soccer and track.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful little machine. I have chronic pain issues. I haven’t had this even a week, but it’s really helping. It takes the pain nearly all away. The affects last a few hours, then I can just do another cycle. The main thing I’m loving is that it relieves the pain so I can get up and move. Then movement usually keeps the pain from being too bad. Otherwise, I’m laying in pain, waiting for pills to help enough so I can move. I also love the pressure points list & diagram that shows you where to put the pads for different needs. Many are not even pain related: anxiety, depression that sort of thing.
customer_reviews.author: Karen K

customer_reviews.title: Great cost/benefit unit.
customer_reviews.text: Great little unit about the size of an iPhone 4 - very convenient with plenty of power. I especially like that it’s rechargeable and the charge lasts quite a long time. After 10 hours of use I still have nearly 60% battery. It did take a little self-training to remember which button to push for power vs mode. One suggestion would be to include 2 electrode pad holders instead of just 1. I did not receive the small size electrode pads-just the large ones. It came in a sealed package so either the web description is wrong or the manufacturer didn’t put them in. Overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: George Helwagen

customer_reviews.title: A true life-saver!
customer_reviews.text: Small, easy to use, battery lasted for days! I ended up needing a 2 level lumbar fusion, so I haven't used this at all in the last 9 months, but I keep it in a safe place in case I need it again! I recommend this to anyone who has chronic pain anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Heather McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Rechargeable - no more replacing batteries
customer_reviews.text: A great massager - many different types of massage to get at the appropriate muscle, and it comes with a nice guide to help you in the positioning of the pads. Smaller than many phones with a clear display and easy to learn user interface. You have two leads for two sets of pads - and you can change the intensity on each set, but the program is the same for both. You can extend the session easily. Everything is easy to set up and to change on the fly. The display is easy to read with backlighting that turns on as soon as you touch a control.
customer_reviews.author: Andy LaCombe

customer_reviews.title: This Tens unit is high quality and has helped me so much. For the first time I feel there’s some hope with being pain free
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a lifesaver!!! I have chronic back pain due to 2 car wrecks within 10 months of each other and since then I have vertebrae that are fusing together both that cause me extreme pain every day of my life. I refuse to take pain medication as that’s just a temporary solution to my problem. I purchased this tens unit and used it 3 times the first day by the second day I had relief of my pain and was able to keep up with my younger kids. It truly has helped me. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT TO ANYONE THAT HAS PAIN. It’s very easy to use and has a long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Katie R.

customer_reviews.title: Overall great unit!
customer_reviews.text: So this was my second time using a tens unit so I didn’t go into it with a whole lot of expectations. I was honestly a little overwhelmed at first with all the cables and settings, but once I got used to it, it was very simple to use. In a week it has provided more pain relief than a whole slew of therapies and pills. My only complaint would be the longevity of the pads. Now I’m aware they aren’t intended to last forever, however I accidentally fell asleep while I had on a brand new set and they had lost all adhesion by the time I woke up.
customer_reviews.author: Amberlee

customer_reviews.title: Better than advertised
customer_reviews.text: I had a different TENS unit, given to me by my doctor, that had stopped working. This device is so much easier to use. The instructions are clear and I love the placement illustrations and acupuncture chart that are included. The strength of the pulses is more than needed and the modes are easy to use and understand. This unit is so much better than my old one that there really is no comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn F. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Rechargeable
customer_reviews.text: I waited to review until I had used it for a few weeks. I have severe sciatica pain, this unit helps me manage the pain. What I like about this unit is that it is rechargeable, I wasted a lot of money on Batteries. I read the reviews before ordering this so I knew about having to cycle through the settings each time, Annoying! What I don’t like is that the sticky pads only adhere for a few weeks before you need new ones. My biggest complaint is that one of the wires has already started to tear. I’m hoping to repair with electrical tape.
customer_reviews.author: Gin

customer_reviews.title: If you have extreme carpal tunnel this is for you
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my carpal tunnel and oh man it has been the only thing to bring me any kind of relief in months. I’m used to waking up every 45 mins at night to shake my hands out even while wearing braces. This hasn’t diminished that entirely but doing it for about an hour before bed has helped greatly. Safe for everyday use, and safe to use for carpal tunnel while pregnant too!! I have used it everyday for about a mi th and I feel a huge difference during the day now too and actually no longer have to use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: KE

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I could drop a star for some not quite intuitive operations but honestly they are not a big deal and for the performance of this little gem it would be inappropriate to give less than five stars. In short, I love the relief this tens unit gives me. I have several areas of chronic pain and the temporary relief I get allows me to sleep better, play pickleball more and enjoy a better quality of life.
customer_reviews.author: Greg B

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Easy to use and really helped
customer_reviews.text: My wife had a pinched nerve that was so bad morphine barely touched it. As we battled ER and urgent care visits we integrated this device at a suggestion of a friend- it didn’t fix the pinched nerve but it sure helped relax the muscles in her neck and shoulder. As the condition improved we kept using this unit, it pulsed her muscles and even made them twitch, really seemed to help them relax and cut down on the knots.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Whinnery

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the unit. I was having pain in my bicep(possibly micro tears) and it is much better since I received the unit. Great machine for the money. I have used tens unit at the chiropractor for my back. That obviously was a large medical grade unit. This unit works every bit as good as that unit. Holds charge a long time and the 24 different settings give me some variety in my treatment.
customer_reviews.author: badgerbob

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 1st use
customer_reviews.text: Received this Tens unit, tried out the 24 options, everything worked fine. Then when I actually needed to use it, it failed to function correctly, I could feel the sporadic pulses with a nice high voltage one thrown in for good measure. A new one is on its way. Hopefully this unit was just that on one failure in 100. Received the replacement unit, it has worked for 3 consecutive uses, however... It fell from its belt clip, hit a carpeted floor and the screen cracked making it completely useless. For me this has proven to be a very cheaply made and inadequate for its intended use. I would recommend moving on to another unit.
customer_reviews.author: Toppor

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I had one and it helps some with my sciatica. My boyfriend tried it (he has CP) and loved it. He said it broke up his knots and brought him significant relief. So I bought him one too! Just be careful though; this thing is powerful, so slowly increase power. It's also easy to carry for travel and can be very discreet.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. And it works!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Tens unit for neck and shoulder pain. It is working wonders for me. I went from barely able to move my neck to almost full use. A few days ago, I woke up with lower back pain which usually takes 4-5 days for it to go away. An hour using the Tens unit and my back was pain free. Great product. Easy to use. Nice and compact. About the size of an iPhone 6.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It helped my calf muscles pain. I made a mistake and put it too strong and gave me a small cramp on one leg but quickly lowered it and it was great. Not the product fault but my own. Wish the printed instructions had a description of each massage methods, but the unit works great and easy to use. I can't wait to receive my free pads on the mail for Registering and Writing a review.
customer_reviews.author: Jairo

customer_reviews.title: A++++ Pain Relief Device
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been experiencing lower lumber pain for 6 weeks and finally went to a Chiropractor. He put me on several machines including a tens unit. The only thing that helped was the tens unit. I cancelled my follow up appointment and ordered one of these tens units from Amazon. Extremely affordable and my FSA paid for it. I couldn’t be more pleased with this unit. Easy to use and has multiple functions. I highly recommend one of these devices for any pain relief you may have. Comes with 8 pads. Once you register your lifetime warranty, they will send you an extra 20 pack pad replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T

customer_reviews.title: More settings than you will ever need. Not durable, but very useful. Just don't drop it (like I did). It's not durable.
customer_reviews.text: This worked great--until I dropped it! Turns out, it's very fragile! Much more fragile than an iPhone (which is made of glass, THIS product is plastic and metal). It wouldn't even limp along after I cracked the display. I dropped it, my fault, but these things happen. I was glad it only cost $40. I purchased another unit for over $240 a couple of years ago, and before that, I purchased an Alpha-Stim that cost more than I care to admit. I have to say, that I think the Hi-Dow unit I purchased is more subtle and durable, but it was much more $$$. So, I will be buying another TechCare for $40 because I am a butterfingers.
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Do not question this unit on power/intensity.  It has plenty.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing so far. No different than the chiropractor. I'm always reaching over and cranking up the power on machine at the therapist office after I get used to the initial setting. I like it when it really "grabs" my muscles. I have yet to max the power setting on this yet and have been perfectly happy with the effect. Easy to use, would be great if it came with a little pouch or something to keep the pads and leads in. Sell a kit with the gel too.
customer_reviews.author: brian smith

customer_reviews.title: Similar to PT STIM and Explanation of modes.
customer_reviews.text: I am currently going to PT and using a device similar to this but professional grade. This device is very comparable. I am very impressed. I am using it for Achilles tendonosis and calf tightness. The different modes are all very similar but they differ in frequency. Some modes pulsate quickly and other are much slower. Each mode has a 1-4 level. This simply increases the frequency. The kneading mode on #4 is a continuous stimulation just like what I use at PT so I have been sticking to this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works as well as the big machine in physical therapy
customer_reviews.text: this machine is built solid and works like a champ. i was worried a battery operated machine would not be able to really dig into the muscles, but i was wrong. i have to turn this thing down on some of the settings. i would put this up against those big, expensive machines in doctors office. fairly easy to operate after you play with it for a few minutes. battery charge seems to last quite a while. using it now on my back as i type review.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: I wish I found this sooner. It doesn’t remove all pain but it does make it bearable. I wish choosing the type was easier to get to. Otherwise, I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: jcampbell

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't even turn on
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box, charged it for over 12 hours and it wouldn't even turn on. Repeated the process again with the same results. Sent it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Toni123

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It does the job and has good power. I don't get what the big difference is among the large array of modes. You have to scroll through the all the modes to get to the one you want each time. Also, the 4 buttons were installed upside down! I happen to know which buttons do what because I had another TENS unit, so didn't replace the unit, but....made in China. I've had 2 Pinook TENS units that cost about $100 each, and this certainly seems as good as they were for a third the price.
customer_reviews.author: tarajean

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this Tens Unit last night. I've been having "knots" in my upper left back, that causes pain to creep up my neck. It took some finagling to figure out how to cycle through the options, but I landed on the right one for me. I let the machine run for 20 minutes...it was a little intense in a great way (I had it up to level 5), and then went to sleep. But when I woke up this morning, all of that shoulder / neck pain was gone! I'm sure I'll have to use the device regularly to keep the pain at bay, but I'm very happy with this unit so far!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months but was instantly replaced, free of charge.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great...while it worked. After a few uses, the power switch just slides loosely back and forth and does not power the unit up—I contacted the seller at wecare@techcaremassager.com, best customer service ever, offered to immediately send a replacement unity free of charge! The unit preforms great, delivering healing electrical impulses to wherever you place the terminal patches, I definitely recommend this device, especially with such great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Diorio

customer_reviews.title: Great features, awesome deal.
customer_reviews.text: Nice features, very well constructed and a large LCD display makes this item a great deal at the price. I have used similar units for lower back pain. This is by far the best unit I have ever used. Great product...
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Helps with pain
customer_reviews.text: I live with chronic pain and am now dealing with rotator cuff issues - this TENS unit helps tremendously. I just received it today and have used it off and on all day. Other than catching the cables on things as I moved about, I pretty much forgot I was using it. I did find the device a bit challenging to figure out initially, but after working with it for a while I eventually got it figured out, turned on, plugged in and easing my pain. I highly recommend this product - just be careful with the intensity settings until you get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Griffis

customer_reviews.title: THOR'S HAMMER
customer_reviews.text: The TechCare Plus24 is " Thor's Hammer," LOL. This tens unit is powerful, and the battery life is impressive. There are several therapeutic modes; all of them are Great! The scrapping and TAI CHI Modes are without WORDS! I had the best sleep after using this little unit. Last year a lady hit and totaled my vehicle and almost half of the year of procedures, chiropractor, and pain meds its been a ride. The tens unit at the chiropractor is perfect and very expensive. My unit is far more superior than theirs- Dropping my Mic- LOL
customer_reviews.author: H.B.

customer_reviews.title: LifeTime Warranty
customer_reviews.text: If you looking to invest money on a tens unit this is the way to go! “Lifetime” warrantee“ - Screen broke contact customer And in less than a week I have a new unit!! Lastly their customer service is epic great things!! Thank the Lord
customer_reviews.author: LoftedThunder

customer_reviews.title: The Tens Unit Plus 24
customer_reviews.text: I researched this product and am very pleased with the pricing and the purchase. I am using The Tens Unit Plus 24 for leg pain and the results, in a short time, are positive. First of all the unit is easy to set up and use after a 10 hour battery charge. Secondly there are 24, yes 24, settings that can be toggled through to provide just the right amount of massage and to personalize the experience. Also the automatic timer is an important feature allowing for a conformable interval and intensity of the massage. I also found the charts and information included in the package very interesting especially the acupuncture treatment points figures.
customer_reviews.author: The Nat Res

customer_reviews.title: easy to use, consistent comfortable relief
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from trigger points in my shoulders, neck soreness, and occasional sciatica all brought on by stress. I have had to do physical therpay for these issues int he past. It wa through PT that i first experienced the therapeutic effects of a TENS unit, and having one at home for days when i'm especially achey is nice. I use it and a hot pad to help relax tight muscles and ease knots. I have enjoyed the relief it brings - my only complaint is that there is no setting for just continuous electronic pulse, only programs with pulse sequences.
customer_reviews.author: GP in NYC

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I like how I was able to figure out the unit very quickly. It has a lot of options and the pads stick well. It took me a couple tried to get the pads situated where they needed to be, to get the maximum stimulation from the electric current. I've used this method before for my knee pain and loved it. Helps decrease inflammation and pain after a few uses. Convenient too. I can sit or lay down and the cords are plenty long for me. I'm short though, so keep that in mind. The price is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Hidden

customer_reviews.title: Had to press on leads to make them work.
customer_reviews.text: I attached the leads but had to press down on pads for them to work. I tried both cords and it still didnt work without me pressing. I did charge it overnight to ensure it wasn't a power issue. I am not sure, maybe I just got a busted one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L

customer_reviews.title: So glad I got this!
customer_reviews.text: Why oh why did I wait so long to get this?!? After dealing with chronic back pain for months from my arthritis I thought I’d tried everything. My physical therapist suggested I try a tens unit just to see if it helped. I used it 2 days in a row and was able to walk upright again! Now I’m just using it occasionally as needed. The included belt clip is nice but does not hold the unit very firmly. I bent over while wearing it and the unit fell out and cracked the screen. Although the screen is unusable I can still use the unit by just remembering the modes.
customer_reviews.author: L W

customer_reviews.title: Much better value than some other models
customer_reviews.text: I have an injured right deltoid so I am supposed to be going to physical therapy 3x a week. Due to COVID, I unfortunately cannot go to physical therapy. I have received a "virtual" therapy plan which included the use of TENS and ICE packs. I looked at many units before finally deciding on this one. I went with the TechCare model because it is rechargeable and has dual outputs. So far I am satisfied, but have only used it 2 times. I will update the review later as I use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I had a TENS unit years ago and used it for several years. Had some neck surgery recently and got another TENS to help with pain and stiffness. The first unit I got was made by someone else and I had trouble with it. I replaced that one with the TechCare unit and there is no comparison. I love this unit. I'm still undecided about the pain management but it seems to help. The TechCare unit is well made and easy to use. I'm recommending it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: A Wheeless

customer_reviews.title: It works...  this supplier delivered ontime packaged perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I really love the relief this Tens Unit has given me from my shoulder pain (feels like a pulled muscle or pinched nerve) i ordered it from this company on a Friday and received it 2 days later on a Sunday as promised. I use it when I'm a work in front of my computer. I set it for up to s full 60 minutes at a time. What a treat :-) the rechargeable battery is excellent. Very lightweight mobile devise. Today ...5 days later I'm not in pain... as soon as the pain appears to return i look forward to using it again.. over all the pain is less often and less severe
customer_reviews.author: Jackie P

customer_reviews.title: As good as the chiropractor's!
customer_reviews.text: I always got a lot of relief from pain at the chiropractor's office when he used the TENS unit, and have been pleasantly surprised that this unit which I purchased works every bit as well. I have probably used it a couple of dozen times and the adhesive on the pads is still good. I like the little plastic thingy they provide to keep the pads on when not in use. It keeps them clean, which helps them adhere. It is easy to use, and for me, very effective. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: mpetriw

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Works well, I do not have anything to compare it to. It is simple to use and comes with a placement guide for the pads. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 star is because the pads don't stick well. Also getting to the mode you want is strange. You have to keep pushing the mode button until you get to the one you want to use, there are 24 modes. I like that there are no batteries and it is rechargeable. Overall for $40 you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Tens unit that works well.
customer_reviews.text: Received mine just a few days ago but my first impression is very positive. The unit is easy to use and has a number of settings for dealing with muscle tension. Holds a good charge, the pads are quite sticky and hold well.
customer_reviews.author: Wiccandolin

customer_reviews.title: Worth FOUR TIMES THE PRICE PAID!!!
customer_reviews.text: This unit is an UNBELIEVABLE BARGAIN!! I am an Electronics Technician and I can honestly say that this looks like and feels like and performs like a $1,000. top of the line cell phone. Screen is crystal clear and bright. You can't go wrong. WHATTA DEAL! I would have missed it if I had turned left in Albuquerque!
customer_reviews.author: Discriminating Buyer in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Dry Electrodes
customer_reviews.text: This is the second tens unit I’ve owned. So in comparison to my prior unit I am disappointed with the pulses and the electrodes. The electrodes on this unit felt prickly when I used them. I had to purchase an electrode gel to use with them each time in order to avoid the prickly sensation. The wave lengths never change the pattern once you choose a setting. You would need to change your setting every so often during use in order to get different patterns so your body doesn’t get used to any one pattern. The plus side is the unit was reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Householder

customer_reviews.title: Giving it a shot
customer_reviews.text: I am trying this unit for neuropathy and bunion pain in my feet, hoping to not have to use the drugs the doctors gave me. This is my first TENS unit, and I was looking for an inexpensive model to try out. Another website highly recommended this one. I like that it is rechargeable rather than using single-use batteries. I was worried about shocking myself, but it's easy to use. I wish the instructions had descriptions of the different modes, but I am just trying out each one until I find what I like. I'm not sure yet if it's helping the discomfort in my feet, but I intend to keep using it for now.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Y.

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed and very versatile
customer_reviews.text: I have osteoarthritis in my spine and use it for pain relief. My physical therapist suggested a Tens unit & he said to find one with different modes so I could alternate between various modes to keep my muscles from getting used to just one mode and it no longer helping. This product is very easy to use and fits the bill perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Hurless

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product for my daughter because she had shoulder pain from playing softball. She used it once and already felt a difference. We are so glad we purchased this product. It’s great quality and easy to use. Quick easy shipping and packaged nicely
customer_reviews.author: Melissa j escamilla

customer_reviews.title: Love, love love this Tens Unit
customer_reviews.text: Where can you buy a little Tens Unit like that, that helps your aches and pains, is small and light weighed, long lasting charge, and has a lifetime warranty....on Amazon. This company is incredible. I lost the little plastic holder and they send me a new one free of charge. I highly recommend this Tens Unit. I swim every day and sometimes my shoulder aches, this unit puts a stop to the pain, and I'm good for the next day. Can you tell I love it!
customer_reviews.author: KAB

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective
customer_reviews.text: As an older athlete, I find myself having to spend quite a bit of money on massage and ART treatments. My bodywork folks use E-Stim on me, so I'm familiar with its positive results. I decided to try an at-home machine, to ultimately save a LOT of money. I looked at reviews on Amazon and elsewhere, and chose the Tens Unit Plus 24. Good grief this thing is effective! And what a reasonable cost! I am SO happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Clair L. Melton

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Work At All
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work for me on my muscles. The company sent me several to replace the original unit and it didn’t make a difference at all. It doesn’t relax tight muscles at all. I’m very disappointed.I purchased it June22-2019 and it’s Life time Warrenty and Amazon won’t refund my money for me to send it back!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Pretty damn good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husbands shoulder issue and he gets so much relief from it. I works fantastic and it's not too bulky which is great. The pads that come with it stick well to his skin and are reusable.
customer_reviews.author: Gumbyprincess

customer_reviews.title: Self help towards a more comfortable life in a unit about the size of a cellphone.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and seems to be well made. Nice and clean look and feel. Operation is pretty straight forward. I have used it on both elbows and neck. It can go from a slight tingle to more than I think I could handle. Tried it on my feet as well but I think I need to learn more about placment. I see Occupational therapist for the elbows and they figured they would divert to ultrasound and other stuff while I do the TENS myself at home.
customer_reviews.author: Dave F.

customer_reviews.title: Works like the professional models but much more reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Very good unit with multiple settings. I was very surprised how well it worked for the price. Having it at home when I have pain flare ups is very convenient. I've even used when driving. The only negative is the pulse it puts out is a bit lower than the professional units. The pro units I can tolerate a 7 out of 10 setting. This I can put it on max and would go one or two higher if I could. Minor complaint on an otherwise solid unit.
customer_reviews.author: py6125

customer_reviews.title: Buy it Now
customer_reviews.text: Don’t hesitate, just get it. Your muscles are going be so grateful, and so is your wallet now that you don’t necessarily need to go get this done st a PT office and oh a high Deductible. It’s easy to use and comes with good instructions - as well as a body map and where to place the stickies and for what.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: I love my Techcare Plus
customer_reviews.text: I love this little machine. It has helped to heal so many aches and pains. I sprained my ankle really bad once and nothing I did helped it until I put my tens on it. I set it for 20 minutes and when I stood up the pain was gone. My husband has used it for his sciatic and gotten great relief. I am using it now for a medial elbow strain. Just in a couple of days it is 90% better. Thank you TechCare for such a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J. Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Good device, horrible warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Good for pain relief, easy to use the warranty is terrible, Mine got damage and I had to claim the warranty the process was easy but they sent me a defective device, contacted them again they offer to send another one, again defective, my wife needed a lot and we couldn’t get a functioning one after being back and forth for over a month, I had to buy new wires because the manufacturer said that could be the issue, we gave up, we really needed it and we decided to buy a different brand device. The device is fine as long as you don’t have to use the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Dante Montano

customer_reviews.title: Great for shoulder/neck!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 71 year old mother with shoulder/neck issues. They use a tens machine at her physical therapist visits and she feels so good after. This little machine is amazing. She is so happy with her purchase! She figured she’d be spending close to $100 for a good one, and we are so thankful she didn’t! It’s about the size of a cell phone and works wonders!!
customer_reviews.author: Dabirrs

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: So Im in my early 20s, and have a bad back from scoliosis and years and years of cheerleading (I was a flyer and got dropped a few too many times apparently). My poor chiropractor feels bad for me, truly. But this thing helps so much! A lot of times, I’ll have issues with seized up muscles that are generally impossible to massage out. This provides some serious relief. I love the different modes. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kal

customer_reviews.title: Great Tens Unit - Low Price!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Tens unit because of good reviews but didn't really expect it to be as good as the one used by my PT......especially because it wasn't that expensive. What a pleasant surprise it was that it worked so well. Small, easy to use, 24 modes, 4 leads...this machine gave my injured neck and back a great tens experience and is really helping me feel better. The intensity of the various modes is strong, and I have never had to turn up any of the modes higher than 1/3 to 1/2 strength. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Brinks

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service was great and helped me with my problem
customer_reviews.text: After having trouble with the 1st one I had getting both modes to work, I returned it, got a new one, still had problems but spoke with the company and he was very patient with me, messaging things for me to do....it works!! I needed to put new electrodes on the unit and now I ordered gel so it will clean the pads and I will have better adhesion....still waiting and hoping some of pain in my shoulder, knees and back will be better. So glad to be able to put the Tens on 2 different locations at the same time. Thank you Tech Care
customer_reviews.author: Joan Giovia

customer_reviews.title: Unit is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a 5 if it wasnt for the stick pads. After 3 times of using it a set stopped sticking. It does come with an extra set though. Besides that this unit is awesome!!! It hits my sciatica and lower back pain due to a bulge disk rite on the spot. I would have it strapped on all the time if I was able too.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for relieving pain
customer_reviews.text: I adore this unit and the kindness and support of the customer service. Absolutely stellar. I can just barely wait for it to fully charge so that I can use it. And, I will pack it and take it on every vacation everywhere I go. Cool stuff and so very glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Price

customer_reviews.title: It's comforting.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had an opportunity to use this product more than two times, but I wish the manual were larger. The directions are difficult to read--not only because the print is small, but also the paper is slick so that the light shines on it. I believe I will like using the product once I'm more used to it. Management sent a large 8 X 11 manual via email. Now, I am satisfied that I am using the unit properly and feel immediately grateful and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: f.blod

customer_reviews.title: No Pain Relief At All and followed instructions for three days
customer_reviews.text: I had such high hopes for this after reading other reviews but it didn't do anything for me. I followed the instructions faithfully. This barely feels like a buzzing and I had used all the different options. Very disappointing but seller did refund.
customer_reviews.author: Vern and Ardee

customer_reviews.title: excellent tens unit!  best value in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: The first win factor on this is that it is rechargeable. The one thing I didn't want to worry about was keeping more batteries on-hand for another electronic device. The number of functions available and number of provided pads for this also make it a winner in my book. Everyone's mileage may vary, but so far I am getting excellent use out of mine. This model is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Crackers Magoo

product_meta.title: Tens Unit Plus 24 Rechargeable Electronic Pulse Massager Machine Multi Mode Device with All Accessories [New Model]
feature_bullets: Intended Use of TechCare Massager: To be used for temporary relief of pain associated with sore and aching muscles in the shoulder, waist, back, upper extremities and lower extremities due to strain from exercise or normal household work activities.

Features: FEATURES: 6 main preprogrammed massage modes with 4 different options in each mode, includes stimulation of Tapping, Acupuncture, Deep Tissue, Foot, Cupping and Combo. Adjustable 10 to 60 minutes timer by using " T " button, press and hold the "M" button to go to the other modes faster. Rechargeable internal lithium battery. Up to 20 hours continues use. A-B Output will allow you to use it as 2 separate users.
Pain Relief: Stimulates the muscles in order to improve and facilitate muscle performance hence help with the pain relief
Large Screen LCD: Large screen lcd and easy user interface makes it easier for elders to read and operate the tens unit

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
